      • createScrollPane

        public static javax.swing.JScrollPane createScrollPane(java.awt.Component view,
                                                       int borders)
        Creates a JScrollPane object for the specified view and initializes its border.
        Parameters:
        view - the component to display in a JScrollPane's viewport
        borders - the SideBorder's flags, which define a JScrollPane's border
        Returns:
        new JScrollPane object
        See Also:
        IdeBorderFactory.createBorder(int)
